attributes.action: require employers to allow, if requested, employees 2 hours paid leave per week to undertake voluntary work with youth organisations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many voluntary youth organisations, including the Scout Association, struggle to recruit adult support due to time committments.

Allowing paid leave during working hours would enable these volunteers time to plan for activities or meet with other local community leaders to strengthen links.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow, if requested, employees 2 hours paid leave per week to undertake voluntary work with youth organisations."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
